sections.title: You cannot use this service because your business does not have a UK Economic Operators Registration and Identification (EORI) number

fields.infoText:
Find out how to [get an EORI number](https://www.gov.uk/eori?step-by-step-nav=db1149f5-f60a-4d02-be0c-9c9db2828665).

Once you have this, you can come back to activate your badge to make CHIEF declarations.

revealingFields.helpText: This is the last 3 letters of the badge.

sections.title: You cannot use this service yet because your business has not received the DTI badge it wants to activate for CHIEF

fields.infoText:
You need to contact a Community Service Provider (CSP) who will issue you with a DTI badge. [Find a Community Service Provider](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/chief-trade-and-commercial-contacts-for-community-service-providers).
 

Once you have your new DTI badge, you need to activate it using this form before you make any declarations.

sections.title: Which Community System Provider (CSP) issued your DTI badge?

fields.label: Which Community System Provider (CSP) issued your DTI badge?
fields.errorMessage: Select which Community System Provider issued your DTI badge
choices: CNS (this is also known as Compass)
FCP or MCP (this is also known as Destin8)
PNT (this is also known as Pentant)

fields.label: What is a CSP?
fields.infoText: CHIEF connects with 5 Community System Providers (CSPs). These are independent trade systems that serve carriers, transit sheds and freight forwarders. CSPs record and track the movement of goods within ports, to help them run more efficiently. You must get your DTI badge from a CSP.

fields.infoText: I confirm that the information in this form is true, complete and accurate.

This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted form.

We will now look at your request and contact you on the email you provided.

If you need to make contact before then, you can email: **chief.operations@hmrc.gov.uk**

For further information see the [transitional simplified procedures guidance page](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/register-for-simplified-import-procedures-if-the-uk-leaves-the-eu-without-a-deal).
